message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, even more so than that price suggests.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $14,000 is my initial offer, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still not convinced that $12,500 is a fair price. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
